Revelations: FISA Court Order Demanding US call records from Verizon
Type of surveillance: Data collection
Type of data collected/monitored: Calls records

Revelations: PRISM: an NSA partnership with US service providers
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data mining, Access to stored communications
Type of data collected/monitored: Emails, chats, videos, file transfers, photos, stored data, VoIP, video conferencing, logins, online social networking details
Data collection source: Directly from the servers of Microsoft, Google, Apple, Facebook, Yahoo, AOL, PalTalk, Skype, YouTube

Revelations: Boundless Informant illustrates NSA's global reach
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data mining
Type of data collected/monitored: Communications metadata

Revelations: GCHQ's cable-tapping Tempora operation
Type of surveillance: Interception of communications
Type of data collected/monitored: Emails, chats, videos, instant messages, photos, browsing history, calls and text messages

Revelations: Internal investigation of post-9/11 warrantless wiretapping
Authorisation for surveillance: Business Records Order, Foreign Content Order, Domestic Content Order, FISA Amendments Act 2008
Type of surveillance: Bulk data collection, Wiretapping, Metadata and content analysis
Type of data collected/monitored: Email records, Content and associated metadata of telephony and internet communications
Data collection source: Fibre-optic cables, gateway switches, data networks, “Chokepoints” in the international telephone switching system

Revelations: Authorisation for NSA analysis of US-based electronic metadata
Type of surveillance: Metadata analysis by “contact chaining”
Type of data collected/monitored: Email records, IP addresses, Telephone numbers
Data collection source: Fibre-optic cables, gateway switches, data networks, “Chokepoints” in the international telephone switching system

Revelations: Extended data collection: EvilOlive and ShellTrumpet
Type of surveillance: Collection of internet traffic, Near real-time metadata analysis, Performance monitoring, Direct email tip alterting
Type of data collected/monitored: Internet traffic, Email records, Internet metadata
Data collection source: Fibre-optic cables, gateway switches, data networks

Revelations: PRISM data acquisition
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data mining, Access to stored communications
Type of data collected/monitored: Emails, chats, videos, file transfers, photos, stored data, VoIP, video conferencing, logins, online social networking details
Data collection source: PRISM: Directly from the servers of Microsoft, Google, Apple, Facebook, Yahoo, AOL, PalTalk, Skype, YouTube. Upstream: Fibre-optic cables

Revelations: Large scale NSA activity in Germany, with domestic cooperation
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Processing of connection data from telephone calls in “near real time”
Type of data collected/monitored: Metadata of telephone calls, emails, text messages and chat transcripts

Revelations: XKeyScore – the NSA search tool for “nearly everything”
Type of surveillance: Content data and metadata collection, Searches “nearly everything a user does on the internet”, Data mining
Type of data collected/monitored: Content and metadata of emails, Social media activity, browsing history, online chats
Data collection source: Fibre-optic cables, gateway switches, data networks

Revelations: NSA Section 702: targeting US persons
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Search of databases for specific US individuals' communications
Type of data collected/monitored: Phone calls, Emails
Data collection source: Service providers, computer and telephone networks

Revelations: NSA auditing and the FISC Opinion
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data retention, Illegal sharing of data
Type of data collected/monitored: Phone calls, Emails

Revelations: US Intelligence Community Budget for 2013
Intelligence agencies: CIA, NSA, National Reconnaissance Office (NRO), National Geospatial-Intelligence Program, General Defense Intelligence Program
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data analysis, Data processing and exploitation
Type of data collected/monitored: Phone calls, Emails, Instant messages

Revelations: Smartphone surveillance
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Interception of data
Type of data collected/monitored: Contact lists, Call logs, Text messages, Pictures

Revelations: India a top target
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data mining
Type of data collected/monitored: Communications metadata

Revelations: NSA collects email address books and buddy lists
Type of surveillance: Data collection
Type of data collected/monitored: Email address books and buddy lists

Revelations: GCHQ's attempts to keep its mass surveillance secret
Type of surveillance: Interception of communications
Type of data collected/monitored: Emails, chats, videos, instant messages, photos, browsing history, calls and text messages

Revelations: Sixty million calls gathered from Spain
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data mining
Type of data collected/monitored: Phone records

Revelations: NSA and GCHQ break into Yahoo and Google data centres
Type of surveillance: Interception of communications, Infiltration of the main communications links that connect Google and Yahoo data centres around the world
Type of data collected/monitored: Data flows across fibre-optic cables that carry information among Google and Yahoo data centres, Communications records

Revelations: Thirty three million Norwegian phone calls logged
Type of surveillance: Data collection
Type of data collected/monitored: Phone calls

Revelations: NSA retains information on UK citizens
Type of surveillance: Data collection, processing and retention
Type of data collected/monitored: Landline numbers, Mobile phone numbers, Fax numbers, Emails, IP addresses

Revelations: NSA collects data “against” countries
Type of surveillance: Data collection
Type of data collected/monitored: Phone records

Revelations: NSA's ambitious four-year goals
Microsoft data centres may also have been NSA targets
Type of surveillance: Interception of communications
Type of data collected/monitored: Communications records
Data collection source: Possibly Microsoft services, such as Hotmail, Windows Live Messenger and Passport

Revelations: Australia offered to share citizens' data with the NSA
Type of surveillance: Australia's spy agency offered to share its own citizens' metadata with the NSA
Type of data collected/monitored: Communications metadata

Revelations: NSA collecting phone location data on an unprecedented scale
Type of surveillance: Tracking, Data collection, Analytics, Pattern matching, Metadata analysis by “contact chaining”
Type of data collected/monitored: Call records, Location data of devices, Cell tower identifiers, Cellphone identifiers and metadata
Data collection source: Cables that connect mobile networks globally

Revelations: Italian leadership, embassy and public targeted by the NSA
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data mining
Type of data collected/monitored: Metadata of phone calls

Revelations: Sweden's FRA engages in offensive operations, has access to XKeyScore
Type of surveillance: Content data and metadata collection. Searches “nearly everything a user does on the internet”. Data mining.
Type of data collected/monitored: Content and metadata of emails, Social media activity, browsing history, online chats
Data collection source: Fibre-optic cables, gateway switches, data networks

Revelations: NSA and others can listen in on GSM phone conversations
Type of surveillance: Cracking A5/1 encryption used in most GSM (2G) phone communications
Type of data collected/monitored: Cellphone signals, Encrypted conversations have potentially been decoded

Revelations: 200 million text messages a day collected and analysed
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data analysis, Contact-chaining, Analytics
Type of data collected/monitored: Content data and metadata of SMS text messages, Financial transactions, Credit card details, Money transfers, Flight itineraries, Location data, Contact networks

Revelations: Personal data from “leaky” smartphone apps targeted by NSA and GCHQ
Codename of surveillance programme(s): WARRIOR PRIDE, Dreamy Smurf, Nosey Smurf, Tracker Smurf, Paranoid Smurf, PORUS, Xkeyscore and Marina (for identification purposes)
Type of surveillance: (1) Interception and collection of data transmitted through communications networks used by iPhone and Android apps (2) Processing of collected data and metadata
Type of data collected/monitored: SMS, MMS, emails, web history, call records and VoIP, videos, photos, buddy lists, notes, calendar (if it's on the phone), downloaded documents, IMEI/IMSI, Blackberry PINS
Data collection source: Communications networks used by Android and iPhone applications, such as Angry Birds, mobile Facebook apps, Flixster and Google Maps.

Revelations: GCHQ monitoring and manipulating social media activity in real time
Type of surveillance: Real time monitoring of users' online activity on popular social media sites, including Facebook, YouTube, Twitter and Blogger. Passive collection of online traffic.
Type of data collected/monitored: Facebook user data, such as chat, subscriber videos, IP addresses, profile information, private messages and images. Similar user data from other social media sites, such as Twitter, Blogger and YouTube.
Data collection source: Exploitation of Facebook Content Delivery Network (CDN) servers. Possible tapping of fiber optic cables.

Revelations: Airport wifi used to track Canadian air travellers
Authorisation for surveillance: Considered unlawful under Canadian laws by the Citizen Lab.
Type of surveillance: IP profiling analytics. Tracking of the wireless devices of thousands of ordinary airline passengers who connected to the public wifi hotspots of airports in Canada and the United States.
Type of data collected/monitored: Metadata including IP addresses and unique identifiers for travelers' wireless devices

Revelations: Webcam images intercepted and retained by GCHQ
Type of surveillance: Interception and collection of millions of Yahoo webcam images. 1.8 million users were targeted by the GCHQ in a six-month period alone.
Type of data collected/monitored: Still images of Yahoo webcam chats, including large quantity of sexually explicit images (though this was “undesirable”).

Revelations: How the FISA Court developed secret legal doctrine allowing mass surveillance
Authorisation for surveillance: FISA, Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court (FISC) orders
Type of surveillance: Data collection and data mining
Type of data collected/monitored: E-mail communications, telephone conversations, financial transactions and general online activity.

Revelations: NSA storing entire countries' phone communications for 30 days
Type of surveillance: Voice interception, collection and mining of phone calls. RETRO is used for the “retrospective retrieval” of calls captured in the past 30 days.
Type of data collected/monitored: Metadata and content data of phone calls.

Revelations: Norway acquires a supercomputer for cryptanalysis
Type of surveillance: Cryptanalysis and data mining

Revelations: “Collect it all” is an explicit Five Eyes goal
Type of surveillance: Mass data collection and processing. Near-real-time metadata analysis. Direct e-mail tip alerting. “Collect it All” proof-of-concept system.
Type of data collected/monitored: Trillions of metadata records

Revelations: GCHQ and NSA aim for global coverage of in-flight phone data
Type of surveillance: Interception and collection of flight passengers' phone data in near real time.
Type of data collected/monitored: At least Blackberry PINs and associated email addresses, Skype addresses and Facebook details.
Data collection source: Mobile phone services offered on airlines

Revelations: NSA and GCHQ recording every phone call in the Bahamas and Afghanistan
Type of surveillance: Interception, collection and retention of the audio of almost every phone call made in the Bahamas and Afghanistan.
Type of data collected/monitored: Audio of mobile phone calls

Revelations: NSA harvesting online images to develop facial recognition capability
Type of surveillance: Mass data collection, cross-referencing of data across diverse databases and facial recognition.
Type of data collected/monitored: Millions of online individual images, passport images (WELLSPRING) and biometric data (PISCES).
Data collection source: Online communications, fibre-optic cables, satellite transmissions and border crossings (for biometric data).

Revelations: Third party countries allow NSA access to internet backbone
Countries: US, UK, Australia, New Zealand, Canada, Algeria, Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Ethiopia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, India, Israel, Italy, Japan, Jordan, Korea, Macedonia, Netherlands, Norway, Pakistan, Poland, Romania, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Spain, Sweden, Taiwan, Thailand, Tunisia, Turkey, UAE
Type of surveillance: Tapping of the fibre optic cables that make up the backbone of the internet. Mass data collection.
Type of data collected/monitored: Online traffic, including emails, instant messages, file transfers, data from virtual private networks (VPNs) and calls made using VoIP, such as Skype.

Revelations: Ordinary internet users account for most of the communications content stored by the NSA
Authorisation for surveillance: Section 702 of the 2008 FISA Amendments Act
Type of surveillance: Mass interception and collection of roughly 160,000 communications, derived from 11,400 unique accounts between 2009 and 2012. Only 11% of those accounts were NSA targets, while the rest were those of ordinary citizens.
Type of data collected/monitored: Online communications (including intimate correspondence) and personal records, such as medical records, school reports, personal photographs and cvs.
Data collection source: Directly from the servers of Microsoft, Google, Apple, Facebook, Yahoo, AOL, PalTalk, Skype, YouTube.

Revelations: Executive Order 12333 allows collection of communications content without a warrant
Type of surveillance: Interception of communications – including content data – for U.S. “foreign intelligence” purposes. This can also include the communications of U.S. persons.
Type of data collected/monitored: Communications metadata and content data.

Revelations: NSA sharing metadata with 23 other US government agencies
Type of surveillance: “Google-like” search tool used to search over 850 billion metadata records. This tool (ICReach) was built by the NSA to share metadata records with 23 other US government agencies.
Type of data collected/monitored: Over 850 billion metadata records, including unique phone identifiers, unique identifiers for SIM cards, GPS coordinates, e-mail addresses and chat handles.

Revelations: New Zealand implemented mass surveillance in 2012-2013
Authorisation for surveillance: Telecommunications Interception Capability and Security (TICS) Act 2013
Type of surveillance: Network tampering. Installation of “cable access” equipment for the collection of metadata probes. Mass metadata surveillance system.
Type of data collected/monitored: Communications metadata

Revelations: Canada monitoring millions of file downloads every day
Type of surveillance: Monitoring of millions of file uploads/downloads per day from more than 100 free file transfer sites, including Sendspace, Rapidshare and Megaupload. Such data is subsequently analyzed and “interesting” files/reports are flagged. LEVIATHAN is a behaviour-based target discovery project. ATOMIC BANJO collected HTTP metadata for 102 known FFU sites. IP correlation and automated analysis of data.
Type of data collected/monitored: Millions of file uploads and downloads per day

Revelations: CSE collects and retains hundreds of thousands of Canadian emails every day
Type of surveillance: Collection, analysis and retention of hundreds of thousands of emails (per day) to the government and monitoring of visits to governmental websites.
Type of data collected/monitored: Emails sent by citizens to the Canadian government and visits to governmental websites. Such activities involved Canadians filing their taxes, writing to members of Parliament and applying for passports.

Revelations: Inside Ironsand: New Zealand's Five Eyes spy base
Codename of surveillance programme(s): Juggernaut, Legalreptile, Latentheat, Semitone, Fallowhaunt, Lopers, Venusaffect systems used in New Zealand's IRONSAND spy base.
Type of surveillance: The IRONSAND spy base in New Zealand is linked into the Five Eyes network and serves as one of the 16 satellite intercept stations worldwide. This spy base includes electronic eavesdropping systems and computer programs that automatically index search captured communications. The various systems used through the IRONSAND spy base break the intercepted satellite signals down into individual communications, collect text messages and call metadata, target voice and fax messages and target landline phones. In general, many of the systems intercept and analyze communications.
Type of data collected/monitored: Fax and voice messages, text messages and call metadata, landline phone calls and other communications.

Revelations: Industrial espionage in Brazil
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data mining
Type of data collected/monitored: Email, Chat, Videos, Photos, Stored data, VoIP, File transfers, Video conferencing, Logins, Online social networking details, Special requests
Data collection source: Microsoft, Google, Apple, Facebook, Yahoo, AOL, PalTalk, Skype, YouTube

Revelations: Social networks of US citizens retrieved and analysed
Type of surveillance: Data collection, Data analysis, Contact-chaining
Type of data collected/monitored: Communications metadata
